channel.title: How Do i make my server 24/7?
channel.description: hi, can someone help me with making my server 24/7 cuz i dont want to run my pc 24hours i know that there is a program called vps it makes the server 24/7 (YOU.BUY.IT) i just wanted to know if someone can help me to get it free or if there is anyother way to get it 24/7

item.title: How Do i make my server 24/7?
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

OP obviously has no understanding of the world outside his parent’s home comforts so all attempts to get him to understand that nothing in life is free will be futile.

Go back to your world of cotton wool and undeserved gifts from the only people in your life who’ll ever care for you. Maybe if you cry and tell them someone hurt your feelings on the internet they’ll give you an extra few dhola a month on top of what you probably already undeservedly get for no effort or work.

Who knows… maybe then you’ll be able to buy a VPS like the rest of these idiots who buy them. Then, when you don’t understand how to use it and expect somebody else to set it up for you, you can piss and cry some more because sure enough no-one will do it for free, you’d never expect that would you. mor-fucking-ron

Pro-tip: have none of you moparscapers ever thought of sharing a VPS, you could easily get a few servers running on one providing they’re not too bloated and slow. Plus it might cause you to actually do some optimisations and code by some form of convention moderately close to those associated with Java. Sharing is caring.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do i make my server 24/7?

item.title: How Do i make my server 24/7?
item.dc:creator: @chocothunda chocothunda
item.description:
@chocothunda wrote:

It is impossible to get free VPS. If you absolutely want to keep your computer off, buy your own server from tigerdirect.com, and set that up to stay on all the time. Put Windows 2003 on it, then just host your server from there, and connect to it through RDP. The only bad thing is, is that servers are expensive. Like $300+ but it is only a 1 time payment. And you can use real money (like irl, not on cpu, and just go to the store and purchase 1).

Read full topic
item.source: How Do i make my server 24/7?

item.title: How Do i make my server 24/7?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Yea, just leave your PC running 24/7 like I do. Make sure no vents are blocked, your room isn’t too hot, and that you don’t have many programs aside from your server running.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do i make my server 24/7?
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

No. You are just acting like an imbicile.
Cleary you weren’t in front of the line when they handed out IQ.

VPS = Virtual Private Server = Hosted somewhere else
Noone is going to host anything for free.
That’s like paying food with monopoly money. You get the spoils, but it’s useless to the seller.

item.title: How Do i make my server 24/7?
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

Samih1996:

hi, can someone help me with making my server 24/7 cuz i dont want to run my pc 24hours i know that there is a program called vps it makes the server 24/7 (YOU.BUY.IT) i just wanted to know if someone can help me to get it free or if there is anyother way to get it 24/7

A VPS is not software it’s a virtual server. They cost anywhere from $10 a month and you need Linux knowledge (Well you can get Windows VPS but they’re REALLY expensive). Or just keep your computer on all the time…
